title: not receiving chest
body: i got an s on thresh and i didn't receive a chest, and yes i got the s on him after the recent chest reset.

replies.body:
There are quite a few additional requirements to be eligible for a chest.  Per the[ hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) guide, you also need to own the champion, not have received one for that champion, and not have used up all your chest tokens for the week.  

Looking into your specific case, it looks like you've already received your Thresh chest for the season.  Let me know if that clears things up!

I'm having the same problem please fix and It says i have chests available but i can't get them even when i get an s- or higher rank can u please explain. also what is the chest slot lock limit{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}
I have been having this same problem but certainly havent recieved a chest this last week
